title: Categorical_Feature_Engineering_2_XGB
description: Welcome to the great Categorical Feature Encoding Challenge #2This notebook is a starter code for all beginners and easy to understand. I used the following notebook to improve knowledge about encoding: https://www.kaggle.com/shahules/an-overview-of-encoding-techniques Additionally there are created new features based on the relationsship between the nominal features.  It is used the XGB Classifier with a simple setting and great results.
